verses.text: \w And|strong="H4714"\w* \w Abram|strong="H0087"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H0802"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w*, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w Lot|strong="H3876"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w*, \w into|strong="H4714"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w south|strong="H5045"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3701"\w* he \w was|strong="H0087"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w rich|strong="H3513"\w* \w in|strong="H3701"\w* possession \w of|strong="H4735"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.

\w And|strong="H8033"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* returned \w by|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w way|strong="H5704"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w*, \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w*, \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w where|strong="H0834"\w* \w before|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* pitched \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* \w between|strong="H0996"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w* \w and|strong="H8033"\w* Hai:

\w In|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w before|strong="H0413"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w Lot|strong="H3876"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w*, \w who|strong="H1980"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w Abram|strong="H0087"\w*, \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w* \w of|strong="H0168"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w herds|strong="H1241"\w* \w of|strong="H0168"\w* beasts, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w tents|strong="H0168"\w*.

\w Neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w able|strong="H3201"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* might \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* substance \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*.

Whereupon also \w there|strong="H1961"\w* arose \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w strife|strong="H7379"\w* \w between|strong="H0996"\w* \w the|strong="H0996"\w* \w herdsmen|strong="H4735"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Abram|strong="H0087"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Lot|strong="H3876"\w*. \w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w time|strong="H0227"\w* \w the|strong="H0996"\w* Chanaanite \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0996"\w* Pherezite dwelled \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w Abram|strong="H0087"\w* \w therefore|strong="H1961"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Lot|strong="H3876"\w*: \w Let|strong="H4994"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H0408"\w* quarrel, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w beseech|strong="H4994"\w* thee, \w between|strong="H0996"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w and|strong="H0376"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w between|strong="H0996"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w herdsmen|strong="H7473"\w* \w and|strong="H0376"\w* thy \w herdsmen|strong="H7473"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w are|strong="H0376"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee: depart \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w pray|strong="H4994"\w* thee: \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thou wilt \w go|strong="H8041"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w left|strong="H8040"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* take \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w*: \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thou choose \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* pass \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w left|strong="H8040"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w Lot|strong="H3876"\w*, lifting \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w* \w about|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, \w which|strong="H5869"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* watered \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H7843"\w* \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Gomorrha, \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* paradise \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w like|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w comes|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* Segor.

\w And|strong="H0376"\w* \w Lot|strong="H3876"\w* \w chose|strong="H0977"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w himself|strong="H6504"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* country \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w he|strong="H0977"\w* \w departed|strong="H5265"\w* \w from|strong="H5265"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w east|strong="H6924"\w*: \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w were|strong="H0376"\w* \w separated|strong="H6504"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w from|strong="H5265"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w other|strong="H0251"\w*.

\w Abram|strong="H0087"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Chanaan; \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w Lot|strong="H3876"\w* \w abode|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w towns|strong="H5892"\w* \w that|strong="H0776"\w* \w were|strong="H0776"\w* \w about|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* Jordan, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w* \w were|strong="H0376"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w sinners|strong="H2400"\w* before \w the|strong="H3068"\w* face \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, beyond \w measure|strong="H3966"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Abram|strong="H0087"\w*, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Lot|strong="H3876"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w separated|strong="H6504"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Lift|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w look|strong="H7200"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w wherein|strong="H0834"\w* thou \w now|strong="H4994"\w* art, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w south|strong="H5045"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w east|strong="H6924"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w west|strong="H3220"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* thou seest, \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w any|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* \w able|strong="H3201"\w* \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w number|strong="H4487"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* \w able|strong="H3201"\w* \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w number|strong="H4487"\w* thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w*.

\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w through|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w length|strong="H0753"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* thereof: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* thee.

\w So|strong="H0834"\w* \w Abram|strong="H0087"\w* removing \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w tent|strong="H0167"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* vale \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Mambre, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w an|strong="H1129"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.
